response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's a testament to innovation, quality, and craftsmanship. Given its unique features and unparalleled performance, we believe its true value exceeds $12,000. Considering the investment required to create such a masterpiece, I am offering this opportunity to you for $15,000. This exclusive offer is tailored to recognize your discerning taste and appreciation for superior quality. I look forward to the possibility of sharing this remarkable product with you.", "product_price": 15000}
